title: Faith Questions in the Seasons of Life
article:
Acomb Churches Together Lent Course at Acomb Methodist Church

4.00pm (refreshments from 3.30pm)

10th March  |  17th March  |  24th March  |  7th April  |  14th April 

Five interactive sessions with worship, teaching and conversation on the seasons of life; from childhood to old-age. Together we'll explore what faith looks like in each season and how the church can reach and disciple people of all ages.
